Game.Name: 2 Games in 1 - Monsters, Inc. + Finding Nemo (USA)
Game.plot: 2 Games In 1 Double Pack: Finding Nemo / Monsters, Inc. is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Vicarious Visions and published by THQ,which was released in Europe in 2004.Cheat: Finding Nemo- Unlock EverythingAt the password screen input the followingCheat: Finding Nemo- Unlock EverythingOn the password screen, enter the password for a specific level. These passwords are for people who don't want to complete the whole game.Cheat: When you use the password M6HM you will have all levels unlocked and all gallery images.
